subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New guy saying hi from Oklahoma
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Welcome, Ron. It gets that way once in a while here. Actually, it's been
pretty laid-back lately. Just realize some people are often tongue-in-cheek
and don't get too serious about anything anyone says. Sometimes it almost
seems like we're a big extended family here.
:-)

Zack

On Fri, Jun 8, 2012 at 2:51 PM, Ron <keltic_cherokee@...> wrote:

>
> Eell you all have a great day I'll see ya later
>
> Ron
